name: Artillery Royale
storyline:
In a fantasy universe, you control a team of warriors, each with their own abilities and weapons to defeat your opponent.

It's an artillery game, where you aim and shoot using a range of weapons.
Turn by turn you have to kill each of your opponent’s characters,
either by inflicting them a deadly shot or throwing them into the lava.
Plan ahead to win the battle!

Include:
- More than 20 weird or classic weapons like bazooka, grenade but also more funky surprises coming up.
- A random map generator, making each game unique.
- Multiplayer local games (couch mode with shared screen) or online games.
- Classic and fun artillery mechanics.

> Play with physics!

Watch out for the wind direction, some weapons are more sensible than others to it than others.
Use grenade bounces to achieve (or fail) tricky shots.

> Destroy everything!

The word is fully destroyable, blow a big hole to trap your enemy.
If you are cornered why not dig your way out using your favorite weapon!

Indie game with a passionate team listening to your feedback!
Join our discord and let us know what you like, dislike, and share your ideas.
summary: Turn by turn Artillery game with fun physics and fully destructible map. Control a team of warriors, with specifics capabilities and weapons to defeat your opponent. To win the battle use strategy and plan your next move ahead!
